info.title: Termite Terror
info.description: Destroy luxurious property as a tiny termite! This game our entry for the Pulse GameJam 2025 hosted by ARD. I made the 3D assets, the termite, and his animation.

info.title: Termite Terror
info.description: Play as a termite to destroy a beautiful house. This game was developed for the Pulse Jam hosted by ARD. I made the 3D assets, the termite, and his animation.

info.title: Ranch Tycoon
info.description: A simulation game heavily focused in building a farm and trying to automate it. Stardew Valey meets factorio with 3D graphics.
